LanguageData.AnimalInsanitySingle: Місцевий {ANIMAL_label} зійшов з розуму. Він буде атакувати все що бачить.
LanguageData.AnimalInsanityMultiple: Якась психічна хвиля прокотилася над землею. Ваші колоністи впорядку, але...\n\nЗдається багато {0} в цьому районі зійшли з розуму.
LanguageData.LetterCropBlight: Blight has been discovered on the {PLANTDEF_labelPlural}! \nYou should cut or burn the affected plants before the blight spreads.
LanguageData.RefugeePodCrash: {PAWN_titleIndef} named {PAWN_nameDef} is crashing in a transport pod nearby. If {PAWN_pronoun} survives the impact, {PAWN_pronoun} will be badly wounded.
LanguageData.RefugeePodCrash_Factionless: {PAWN_nameDef} is not affiliated with any faction. You can rescue {PAWN_objective} and hope {PAWN_pronoun} joins freely, or capture {PAWN_objective} for recruitment or slavery purposes.
LanguageData.RefugeePodCrash_Hostile: {PAWN_nameDef} is from your enemy {PAWN_factionName}. You can capture {PAWN_objective} for recruitment or slavery purposes.
LanguageData.RefugeePodCrash_NonHostile: {PAWN_nameDef} з {PAWN_factionName}. Якщо ви врятуєте {PAWN_objective}, {PAWN_pronoun} може приєднатися до вас. Otherwise, {PAWN_pronoun} will return home and spread goodwill between your factions.\n\nYou can also capture {PAWN_objective} for recruitment or slavery purposes, but this will anger {PAWN_possessive} faction.
LanguageData.CargoPodCrash: You have detected a cluster of cargo pods crashing nearby.\n\nPerhaps you'll find something useful in the wreckage.
LanguageData.ShortCircuit: A fault in {0} has caused a short circuit.
LanguageData.ShortCircuitStartedFire: A fault in {0} has caused a short circuit which started a fire.
LanguageData.ShortCircuitDischargedEnergy: All {0} Wd of energy in the connected batteries has been discharged in an electrical explosion.
LanguageData.ShortCircuitWasLarge: This large amount of power has created an explosion of considerable size.
LanguageData.ShortCircuitWasHuge: That really is a huge explosion. Wow.
LanguageData.TraderArrivalNoFaction: They are not affiliated with any faction.
LanguageData.SingleTravelerPassing: A {PAWN_title} from {1} is passing by. {PAWN_pronoun} is named {PAWN_nameFull}.
LanguageData.GroupTravelersPassing: A group of travelers from {0} are passing by.
LanguageData.SingleVisitorArrives: {PAWN_titleIndef} from {1} is visiting the colony.\n\n{PAWN_pronoun} is named {PAWN_nameFull}.{3}{4}
LanguageData.SingleVisitorArrivesTraderInfo: {PAWN_pronoun} seems to have a few items to trade.
LanguageData.SingleVisitorArrivesLeaderInfo: {PAWN_pronoun} is the leader of the faction.
LanguageData.GroupVisitorsArriveTraderInfo: Вони здається, мають кілька речей для торгівлі.
LanguageData.GroupVisitorsArriveLeaderInfo: Один з відвідувачів - {1_labelShort}, є лідером цієї фракції.
LanguageData.ManhunterPackArrived:
A pack of man-hunting {0} have entered the area. They will roam the region, hunting for humanoid flesh.

They won't attack doors unless they see someone go through the door. Hide inside and you'll be safe. They also won't attack turrets that are powered down, so turn your turrets off to save them.

The {0} will leave the area in one or two days. You can hide and wait them out, or fight them.
LanguageData.MessageAnimalInsanityPulse: The {SOURCE_label} has emitted a psychic pulse that has driven nearby animals mad.
LanguageData.LetterShipPartDroveColonistInsane: The crashed ship part has emitted a focused psychic pulse that has driven colonist {0} insane.
LanguageData.LetterPsychicDroneLevelIncreased: The crashed ship part is now emanating a more powerful kind of psychic drone. Every humanlike in the area now feels more disturbed, terrified, and paranoid.
LanguageData.LetterAgentRevealed: {0} has been revealed as an agent of your enemy {1}.\n\nThey are attempting to escape now.
LanguageData.BeaversArrived: A group of hungry alphabeavers has just arrived.\n\nTry to eliminate them before they decimate every last source of wood in the region.
LanguageData.LetterAnimalSelfTameAndNameNumerical: {0} has become tame. It is now designated {ANIMAL_nameFull}.
LanguageData.LetterAnimalSelfTameAndName: {0} has become tame. Colonists have decided to name it {ANIMAL_nameFull}.
LanguageData.LetterFarmAnimalsWanderIn: A group of {0}, abandoned or lost, have wandered into the area.\n\nThey seem accustomed to human contact and are joining the colony.
LanguageData.LetterThrumboPasses:
A small herd of thrumbos have wandered into the area.

Peaceful by nature, these rare creatures are extremely dangerous when confronted. Some traders are willing to pay a lot of money for their precious leather and horn.

Thrumbos will leave the area in a few days.
LanguageData.LetterTraderCaravanArrival: A caravan from {0} is approaching. They are a {1}.
LanguageData.LetterCaravanArrivalCommonWarning: They will hang around the colony for some time before leaving. You can attack them - but this will anger their faction!
LanguageData.RansomDemand: {1} contacts you on radio. They are holding former colonist {PAWN_labelShort} for ransom.\n\nThey're willing to release {PAWN_objective} back to you in exchange for {2} silver.
LanguageData.EscapeShipFound:
Ви дійшли до координат, надісланих Шарлон Вайтстоун і знайшли прихований зоряний корабель.

Корабельний реактор все ще знаходиться в режимі гібернації, тому він ще не може взлетіти. Ви можете запустити його, взаємодіючи з ядром комп'ютера.

Шарлон Вайтстоун попереджає, що процес запуску триватиме близько 15 днів, і енергетичний слід буде помітно з великої відстані. This sort of energy signature indicates interstellar flight capability, and will attract gangs of desperate raiders and swarms of deadly mechanoids.

You will be assaulted with an intensity you've never seen. Make sure your defenses are prepared first.
LanguageData.EscapeShipFoundPeaceful:
Ви дійшли до координат, надісланих Шарлон Вайтстоун і знайшли прихований зоряний корабель.

Корабельний реактор все ще знаходиться в режимі гібернації, тому він ще не може взлетіти. Ви можете запустити його, взаємодіючи з ядром комп'ютера.

Шарлон Вайтстоун warns you that the startup process will take about 15 days.
LanguageData.EscapeShipLost:
Шарлон Вайтстоун sends you a message.

He sees that you've lost control of the landed ship. To stop it falling into the wrong hands, he's been forced to trigger the ship's self-destruct mechanism. The ship is now a crater.

You'll need to find another way off this planet.
LanguageData.CaravanMeeting: {0} has met peacefully with a caravan from {1}. The other caravan is composed of:\n\n{2}
LanguageData.CaravanMeeting_TradeIncapable: no caravan members capable of trading
LanguageData.CaravanMeeting_NoPermit: need a trader with the title of {0} from {1_name}
LanguageData.LetterCaravanRequest:
A nearby settlement, {0}, contacts you with a special trade request. They would like to purchase:

 {1} (worth {2})

In return, they offer:

 {3} (worth {4})

This request expires after: {5}

If you want to make the trade, send a caravan with the requested supplies. The estimated travel time is {6}. You can review this offer by selecting {0} on the world map.
LanguageData.CaravanDemand: {0} has been ambushed by a group of {2} {4} from {1}. They will attack unless you give them:\n\n{3}
LanguageData.LetterSiteNoLongerHostile: Because you are no longer hostile with {0}, the {1} site is no longer available.
LanguageData.LetterSiteNoLongerHostileMulti: Because you are no longer hostile with {0}, the following sites are no longer available
LanguageData.LetterQuestAskerFactionHostile: The quest is now incompletable because {FACTION_name} is hostile.
LanguageData.LetterQuestAskerCaptured: The quest is now incompletable because {SUBJECT_definite} has been captured.
LanguageData.LetterQuestAskerDied: The quest is now incompletable because {SUBJECT_definite} has died.
